animeTitle: Renmei Kuugun Koukuu Mahou Ongakutai Luminous Witches
otherNames: 連盟空軍航空魔法音楽隊 ルミナスウィッチーズ ; れんめいくうぐんまほうおんがくたいルミナスウィッチーズ ; Ongakutai Witches ; Luminous Witches ; Allied Air Force Magical Idols Luminous Witches ; Idol Witches
synopsis: These are witches who defend everyone's smiles and fight enemies through the healing power of music. These witches, opposite of those in the defense fleet, are idols known as the Music Squadron.
